summary: The Ready Reserve Act of 2025 (S. 1859) amends Title 10 of the United States Code concerning the Ready Reserve. The bill aims to modify early retirement eligibility for certain Ready Reserve members who served on active duty after September 11, 2001. Specifically, it changes the date used to determine eligibility from January 28, 2008, to September 11, 2001, allowing more veterans to qualify for early retirement.
